title: Are the Jonas brothers an autotuned version of the Bee Gees? Do they write their songs as the Bee Gees did? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sadly auto tune is used on their albums, but probably for some pith correction in different spots. They have had a hand in writing some of their songs, and I believe Nick wrote a song or two possibly more. I am a BEE GEE’S fan from about 6 years of age, that’s 44 years of listening to their music. I personally don’t think the Jonas brothers [as good as they are] get anywhere near their level.
